entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: updates #60615
  • Perf regression: mTls-handshakes-httpsys, single_query, tls-renegotiation-httpsys #60614
  • Perf improvement: json #60613
  • HasAllowAnonymous() could be called earlier? Possible (small) improvement? #60611
  • NativeAOT: No coercion operator is defined between types 'Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.StringValues' and 'System.String' #60609
  • Does @microsoft/signalr support react-native? #60606
  • Make `CollectionModelBinder` better extensible for custom model binders #60605
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #60604
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json, json_middleware #60603
  • Breakpoints not pausing execution in a HTML <select> <option> onchange event #60602

Closed

  • Self hosted signalr - TLS 1.3 problem #59793
  • Allow [FromQuery] to work with simple objects in Minimal API. #42438
    Backlog
  • Especialista Hackear Instagram Online #60600

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to servicing #60620
    area-infrastructure
  • Clarify DefaultPolicy and FallbackPolicy Behavior in XML Docs #60619
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Support resolving OpenAPI server URLs from HttpRequest #60617
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add support for ServerSentEventsResult and extension methods #60616
    area-minimal
  • Fix incorrect path to included script file in Blazor project template #60607
    area-mvc

Merged

  • update area owners #60421
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Add support for AddOpenApiOperationTransformer API #60566
    feature-openapi, area-minimal, 10.0-preview3
  • Update branding to 2.3.1 #60610
    area-infrastructure, 2.3.1
  • [release/10.0-preview2] Fix incorrect path to included script file in Blazor project template #60608
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, area-blazor, 10.0-preview2
  • [release/10.0-preview2] [release/10.0-preview1] Do not remove wixpacks from items to sign #60525
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 10.0-preview2
  • [main] [release/10.0-preview1] Do not remove wixpacks from items to sign #60524
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `445e9bd` to `a6ce08a` #60538
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix overload resolution issue for Delegate and RequestDelegate #60593
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • view-data-* attribute for partial tag helper #60459
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Scroll in enhanced navigation behaves same as in client side routing #60296
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-enhanced-navigation
  • Setting the Description in a ProducesResponseTypeAttribute works correctly for Minimal API #60539
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.3.25122.1 #60564
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Readonly setter calls on non-variables #9174

PullRequests

Created

  • Expand first-class span proposal with a simple example #9176
  • [Proposal] Readonly setter calls on non-variables #9175

Merged

  • Fix example #9173
  • Fix typo #9172
  • Create implicit-compatibility-for-ported-extension-methods.md #9171

Updated

  • Dictionary expressions: include collection arguments #9162
  • Revamp proposal for list patterns on enumerables #9165

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Clarification on error with `Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design` #35685
  • Update of FK with Include of Reference will be ignored #35684
  • AutoInclude causes infinite cycle when applying on the self-referencing key #35683
  • Changing two subqueries to a single subquery with a select breaks my query #35682

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "[release/2.3] Use latest available Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.WebHostBuilderFactory.Sources" #35688

Merged

  • [release/2.3] Use latest available Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.WebHostBuilderFactory.Sources #35687

Updated

  • Improve LoadExtension to work correctly with dotnet run and lib* named libs #35617
    community-contribution
  • Navigation test refactoring initial work #35652
  • Update System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe to 6.1.1 conditionally #35651
  • Use Invariant Culture for ChangeType #35675
    community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The MaximumVisible property in the IndicatorView is not working correctly #28036
    Backlog
  • Screen Reader Not Skipping Hamburger Menu Button on Flyout Page #28034
  • CollectionView2 Layout Misalignment in GridItemsLayout with Horizontal Orientation on iOS and Catalyst #28030
  • [Testing] Unable to Select Individual Picker Items in iOS and Catalyst Using Appium #28024
    Backlog
  • I2 - Entering the vertical and horizontal lists again, Monkeys still retain the spacing value changed last time #28023
  • [Testing] EmptyView(null ItemsSource) elements Not Accessible via Automation on Windows Platform #28022
    Backlog

Closed

  • CollectionView with grouped data crashes on iOS when the groups change. #27797
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Shell flyout throws an exception on Android if there's a FragmentLifecycle.Callback #27889
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Rectangle layout issue in a Grid #13126
  • [MacCatalyst] BoxView CornerRadius property is not working #10480
  • MAUI Android Flyout Menu: Opening the Flyout Menu programmatically does not work correctly. #13233
  • visual studio 2022 Maui .net 9 build issues #27759
  • Create a PickerCell to be used with a TableView #5920
    Backlog
  • [Enhancement] CalendarView #5486
    Backlog
  • UseInterpreter for cpecific library only? #28032
  • In the project properties, the Custom Entitlements is missing .NET MAUI #22299
    Backlog
  • API mediapicker to take photo without user tap on take photo button #22723
    Backlog
  • CS0117: 'Resource' does not contain a definition for #22796
    Backlog
  • Add a `TabView` control #23028
    Backlog
  • When executing the ‘dotnet tool restore’ command on MAUI repository on mac, it prompts that the command could not be load #24535
    Backlog
  • *.appinstaller - outdated schema #23583
    Backlog
  • .Net Maui CheckBox enabled color is not updated properly. #23608
    Backlog
  • The header in a collectionview does not resize if you hide the content #28012
    Backlog
  • [iOS/Mac] CollectionView is not shown when parent IsVisible is switched to true #23573
    Backlog
  • IsVisible false is not propagated to child controls #19139
    Backlog
  • fatal Exception: System.ArgumentNullException #24402
    Backlog
  • Support for Sending POS Commands via Bluetooth in ESC-POS.NET #24654
    Backlog
  • In Iphone13 (ios 15.0) version button click events not working fine in iphone 16 working fine #25244
    Backlog
  • SwipeView causes Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot add a null child view to a ViewGroup #26328
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Enhancement, Epic] Improve debug experience #27016
    Backlog
  • Reenable disabled flaky UI tests #27272
    Backlog
  • UITests broken for net9 #23064
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Cannot deploy app in debug using hot restart (skiasharp issue) #28026

PullRequests

Created

  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10.0 #28044
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [code style] Prefer file-scope namespaces #28040
    community ✨
  • [Android] Refactor: Remove Obsolete API Usage & Fix Warnings in FilePicker and FileSystemUtils #28038
    platform/android 🤖, area-essentials, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 18 #28033
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Mark MapReload from PickerHandler Obsolete #28028
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update default value for LineHeight in the ToNSAttributedString method #28027
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Testing] Implement the option to change system theme on Appium #28025
    area-testing

Merged

  • remove Dispose call on ShellItemRenderer #27890
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Fix flaky UITests 7 #28000
    area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for Slider Control #27433
    area-testing, community ✨, area-controls-slider, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] CollectionView with grouped data crashes on iOS when the groups change - fix #27991
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR5

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Unable to view Call Hierarchy on Primary Constructors in C# #77327
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense doesn't work in watch window #42718
    Backlog
  • Override completion should place cursor near arrow #29495
    Backlog
  • Public API for partial events #77203
  • Go to definition should go to intercepted source generated code #77336
  • Allow to change the behavior for interfaces for rule IDE0040: Accessibility modifiers required #77253
  • Wrong Architecture in Artifact Feed #77317
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35824.58 #77333

Updated

  • Do not include folder name to namespace #45494
    Backlog
  • C#: The compiler should be consistent about issuing error CS1612 when modifying readonly rvalue struct #45284
    Backlog
  • Test Plan for Partial Events and Constructors #76859
    .NET 10
  • The CompilersPackage is using old setup targets that may be obsolete #77269
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent behavior of attribute target specifiers on events #77254
    Backlog
  • Unexpected nullable warning on expression used in tuple assignment #77245
    Backlog
  • False Positive in Analyzer IDE0052 when ref Fields are involved #77251
  • ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull prevents automatic exception documentation #77281

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement metadata signature conflict check for extension implementation methods #77338
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Partial events and constructors: IDE #77337
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors

Merged

  • Support 'view call hierarchy' on primary consstructor #77328
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Don't realize the SourceText in SyntaxTree.OverlapsHiddenPosition if not needed #77334
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix issue in watch window completion #77204
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Handle ModuleCancellationTokenExpression in AbstractFlow visitor #77310
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • PERF: Reduce the number of nodes walked during import completion commit. #77305
    VSCode, Next
  • Allow expression body refactorings on non empty selections #76969
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Null annotate MetadataHelpers #77309
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Enable basic end-to-end scenarios of extension method invocation. #77320
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Partial events and constructors: public API #77202
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Disallow initializers on partial constructor definitions #77275
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Update configs for 17.14 P2 snap #77329
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Snap main to 17.14 P3 #77332
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode

Updated

  • [WIP] Merge RoslynAnalyzers into Roslyn #77178
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Adds lightbulb option to offer implementing `NotImplementedException` #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Improve performance of SyntaxReplacer.ReplaceNode #77314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implemented IVsEditorFactoryChooser on AbstractEditorFactory class to invoke WinForms designer editor factory directly by VS Shell #77306
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77292
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Allow cohosting to make changes to source generated documents #77331
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rework analyzer assembly loading #77004
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Requires Dynamic Code on a default constructor not respected when inherited. #112931
  • Proposal: expose 'IlcDehydrate' as a supported option #112927
  • [Wasm][net10] Building with `WasmBuildNative` and threading enabled fails with assertion #112926
    Future
  • `NamedPipeServerStream` recieves empty string from client #112912
  • AssemblyLoadContext.LoadFromAssemblyPath returns old Assembly #112911
  • .NET TP Worker: segfault on Linux #112910
  • Native image double mapping #112901
  • [API Proposal]: Add Parallel.InvokeAsync #112900
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 48 Regressions on 2/21/2025 4:40:21 PM +00:00 #112913
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: MDArray2 Regression on 2/18/2025 9:18:32 PM +00:00 #112915
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: IPAddressPerformanceTests Regression on 2/17/2025 9:03:44 PM +00:00 #112916
  • Rfc2898DeriveBytes.Pbkdf2 holding threads #112898
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 6 Regressions on 2/20/2025 3:57:18 PM +00:00 #112914
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: Perf_BigInteger Regressions on 2/20/2025 10:08:05 AM +00:00 #112919
    10.0.0
  • Signal SIGILL (Illegal instruction) code ILL_ILLOPN (Illegal operand) after migrate to .net9 #112897
  • Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle.CreateFile Access Denied After a While #112896
  • System.Memory 4.6.0 causes Azure Cloud Services (extended support) deployment failure #112887

Closed

  • JIT: Reconsider block weight propagation in loop cloning #103001
    10.0.0
  • JIT throughput: noway_assert #7709
    10.0.0
  • expose env variable to disable optimizations #94280
    10.0.0
  • Addressing mode was not contained #112692
    Future
  • LINQ.Expressions Power operator and BigInteger or Complex or custom #24708
  • Process crash when System.IO.Pipes.PipeCompletionSource.Cancel() throws ObjectDisposedExeption #39902
  • NativeAOT conflict resolution bug remains in v8.0.406 #112899
  • Incorrect key file location in linux rpm packages-microsoft-prod-1.0-1.noarch #111757
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'unreached' in 'TestHFAandHVA:ReturnVector2WrapperPromoted():TestHFAandHVA+Vector2Wrapper' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #112890
  • JIT: Wrong result with double comparison #112871
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Tests.Integration.DelayLoadingTests.PartTypeLoadedLazilyLazyLoopLoadsLazily #110130
    10.0.0
  • build release/9.0 android and ios local failed #110278
  • [outerloop] Assertion failed '(*use)->WasMorphed()' in R2R legs #112867
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Test.EmitterTests.TestEmitter #112847
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorParserTests.MultipleTypeDefinitions #112837
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorEmitterTests.TestEmitter #112838
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorEmitterTests.TestBaseline_TestWithNestedClass_Success #112840

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Swift shipping] Create `Swift.Bindings.Experimental` and tooling NuGet packages in the dotnet-experimental feed #2849

Updated

  • Vectorized Dictionary Experiment Results #3025
  • [Swift shipping] Implement device testing framework #2850

PullRequests

Merged

  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Functional tests for `InitWithCopy` and `Destroy` functions in value witness table #3009
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift shipping] Add `Swift.Bindings.Experimental` nuget to `dotnet-experimental` for device tests #3014
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Document memory ownership and handling at the Swift–C# boundary #3008
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift language feature] Implement generic parameters/types with generics in Swift async functions #3023
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet CLI should return a list of target frameworks of the project or use target framework as a filter. #47093
  • [MSTest template] aka link for test runner doesn't seem to be correct #47092
  • [MSTest template] Test runner wording should be VSTest/Microsoft.Testing.Platform rather than VSTest/MSTest #47090
  • [NETSDKE2E]With .NET 10.0.0-preview.2.25121.10, Running 'dotnet restore' failed with error MSB1025 #47089
  • [NETSDKE2E] SDK version not displayed in .NET 10 Preview 2 installer UI #47080
  • PGO Instrumented SDK fails to bind to CoreCLR on Windows #47079

Closed

  • dotnet workload restore failing in ADO pipeline #45931

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete workload-related things if the rest of the operation was unsuccessful #47110
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Allow disabling scenario-tests that don't work in the first build pass #47108
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build tests on Linux and Windows #47106
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify redist-installer and build installers in the VMR #47104
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change MSTest Runner to Microsoft.Testing.Platform #47091
    untriaged, Area-Common templates

Merged

  • Add installer tests project #46927
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update implicit version #47053
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add test-tools feed to NuGet.config #47095
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Set target rid based on passed in prop, instead of host SDK #47022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Set target rid based on passed in prop, instead of host SDK #47023
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable building sdk tests in the VMR #47103
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use PackageDownload in BundledTemplates #47098
    untriaged
  • Update .net10 p1 to p2 in the table #47054
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add spec for `dotnet run file.cs` #47020
    documentation, untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Use pipeline artifacts for final artifacts and enable caching #46796
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add VMR step to validate asset baseline #46991
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2650510 #47010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use right hand side references even when not compatible #47065
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Move BuildWithNetFrameworkHostedCompiler to common #47067
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change property used for after-publish target #47068
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47069
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add basic support for 'dotnet run file.cs' #46915
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Ignore generic type parameter names when matching #40359
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
